titles.title: Fair Treatment of Compensation in Bankruptcy Act of 2002
To amend section 507(a) title 11 of the United States Code to increase, with respect to priority of payment, the aggregate amount of the claims of employees for compensation and benefits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.

bill.summary: 7/22/2002--Introduced. Fair Treatment of Compensation in Bankruptcy Act of 2002 - Amends Federal bankruptcy law to increase from $4650 to $13,500 the aggregate amount of a claim to recover employee wages and benefits that has priority ranking among unsecured creditor claims.
